title: Replace platform emojis with logos and add slide navigation arrows

requirements.text: Replace all platform emoji icons with actual logo images: Steam logo for PC platform, Xbox logo for Xbox platform, PlayStation logo for PS4/PS5 platforms

quotes: Make the game logos in steam xbox and ps icon too not just emojis and remove emojis like for xbox there will be xbox logo and for pc there will be steam same as ps for playstation

acceptanceCriteria: Platform badges on game cards display actual logo images instead of text emojis
Steam logo appears for PC platform games
Xbox logo appears for Xbox platform games
PlayStation logo appears for PS4 and PS5 platform games
Logo images are properly sized and styled to match the existing badge design

requirements.text: Add white navigation arrows to the horizontally scrollable game rows to guide users on how to slide through games

quotes: when sliding b/w games there must be horizontal slides so if slides are horizontal add white normal arrow to guide people where to slide

acceptanceCriteria: White arrow buttons appear on both left and right sides of each game row
Arrows are positioned to clearly indicate horizontal scrolling capability
Left arrow is hidden or disabled when at the start of a row
Right arrow is hidden or disabled when at the end of a row
Clicking arrows smoothly scrolls the game row horizontally

constraints: Maintain existing game card layout and styling
Preserve the horizontally scrollable row structure in GameCatalog component
Keep the white/black/blue color scheme consistent
nonGoals: Changing the overall layout of the game catalog
Modifying the game data model or backend platform logic
Altering the existing platform filter functionality

required: Steam platform logo icon with transparent background (steam-logo.dim_64x64.png)
Xbox platform logo icon with transparent background (xbox-logo.dim_64x64.png)
PlayStation platform logo icon with transparent background (playstation-logo.dim_64x64.png)
